product_name: Rollerblade Inline Skates Bag - Special Buy
long_description: The Rollerblade Skate bag is the perfect way to store and transport your inline skates. Large main compartment fits a pair of inline skates and other small items. Mesh exterior pocket features a drawcord closure. Durable polyester construction. Bag measures 17 x 15 x 8 in.and offers 2,000 cu. in. of space. Special buy.
short_description: The Rollerblade Skate bag is the perfect way to store and transport your inline skates.
